Your mind is unusually resilient and resistant to influence. When you would gain the [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) condition,  you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don't gain the fascinated or stupefied condition.
